anya-e0605n24:0_0: Provisions in rolling the Wheel of Dhamma
anya-e0605n24:2_0: Or to relate to the perfect awakening, made from pure abode, and clean.
anya-e0605n24:4_0: Seven days while the beings in the pleasures of the fruits of the debate,
anya-e0605n24:5_0: He rolled forth the Wheel of Dhamma.
